text: Emmanuel Ampeah (born 22 April 1968) is a retired Ghanaian football defender. He was a squad member at the 1992 and 1994 Africa Cup of Nations, including the 1992 Africa Cup of Nations Final, scoring his penalty in the lengthy penalty shootout. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghana international footballers Category:1992 African Cup of Nations players Category:1994 African Cup of Nations players Category:Asante Kotoko SC players Category:King Faisal Babes FC players Category:Berekum Arsenal players Category:Association football defenders
title: Emmanuel Ampeah
